meanings.definition: To cover or hide with a screen.
meanings.sent1: She bescreened the window to keep the sunlight out.
meanings.sent2: I bescreened my phone to protect it from scratches.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat bescreened itself behind the curtains, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were bescreened by a mask of indifference.
meanings.sent5: The magician bescreened the disappearing act with smoke and mirrors.

meanings.definition: The act of concealing or obscuring with a screen.
meanings.sent1: The bescreening of the garden made it a private oasis.
meanings.sent2: The bescreening of the movie added an element of mystery.
meanings.sent3: The bescreening of the cake with frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The bescreening of the truth left everyone in suspense.
meanings.sent5: The bescreening of the stage set the mood for the play.
